Class Crypto

  • java.lang.Object
    • Crypto

  • public class Crypto
extends java.lang.Object

    Decrypt/encrypt data (with triple DES algorithm)

    Decrypting/encrypting data using Bouncy castle.

    Note: when first parametar is 1 encrypting is performed when it is 0 then decrypting is performed. Note: OStavio sam polja i metode public cisto zbog preglednosti u javadoc-u!

    Since:
    2016-02-26

      Provider which is used (BC - Bouncy Castle).

      Does we use ing or not (no in this use).

      • encrypt

        public java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String command,
                                java.lang.String data,
                                java.lang.String inputKey)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to decrypt/encrypt data.
        Parameters:
        command - 0 - decrypt, 1 - encrypt
        data - This is data have to be decrypted/encrypted
        inputKey - Key for decrypted/encrypted
        Returns:
        String Decrypted/encrypted value
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - On input error.
        See Also:
        Exception

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This is the main method which makes use of encrypt method.
        Parameters:
        args - Accept 3 arguments. First is 0 - decrypt, 1 - encrypt, second is data for encrypting, third is key which have to be used.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - On input error.
        See Also:
        Exception
